diff.sql: CREATE TABLE `il_message` ( `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message` text, `creator` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message_type` int(1) NOT NULL , `hl7_type` char(10), `retired` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `uuid` char(38) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`), UNIQUE KEY `il_message_uuid_index` (`uuid`), KEY `user_who_created_il_message` (`creator`), CONSTRAINT `user_who_created_il_message` FOREIGN KEY (`creator`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
